backend/main.mo: Defines investment plans, AI insights, leads, and user wallet maps, initializes default plan data, and provides comparison helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to involved files, components, and requirements with confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides short summaries of many frontend files describing their purpose and functionality.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling defining color tokens, dark mode variables, and base layout rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting metadata, fonts, favicon, and mounts the React application.
frontend/public/favicon.svg: SVG favicon containing a red-accent geometric logo on a dark background.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Wraps the application router with a React Query client provider using configured defaults.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Dialog handling Internet Identity login with success, error, and loading states and automatic navigation on success.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Dashbo: Dashboard header showing branding, profile navigation, and sign‑out logic with loading states.
frontend/src/components/insights/AIInsig: Displays AI-generated market insights with loading, error, and styled insight cards using data from useAIInsights.
frontend/src/components/site/AnalyticsPr: Shows animated portfolio metrics and a sample performance chart with a demo disclaimer.
frontend/src/components/site/ContactSect: Provides a contact form with validation, lead submission, and optional lead list display.
Renders an accordion of predefined FAQs about the AI investment platform.
frontend/src/components/site/FeaturesSec: Lists feature cards highlighting AI capabilities, security, and analytics benefits.
frontend/src/components/site/HeroSection: Displays the landing page hero with background visuals, headline, CTAs, and quick stats.
frontend/src/components/site/PricingSect: Displays investment plans with risk badges, loading states, and an invest flow trigger requiring sign‑in if unauthenticated.
Renders site footer with brand info, quick links, social links, and a disclaimer, including smooth scrolling navigation.
Provides a responsive header with navigation links, sign‑in or dashboard CTA, and a mobile sheet menu.
frontend/src/components/site/StartInvest: Implements a multi‑step dialog for confirming, entering, reviewing, and submitting an investment purchase with balance validation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAIInsights.ts: Fetches AI insights from the backend actor using React Query, enabled once the actor is available.
Triggers a timeout callback after 15 minutes of inactivity on non‑excluded routes, resetting on common user actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status helpers.
frontend/src/hooks/useInvestmentPlans.ts: Fetches investment plans from the backend actor using React Query, enabled once the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeads.ts: Fetches lead entries from the backend when enabled and the actor is available.
frontend/src/hooks/useLeadSubmission.ts: Defines a mutation to submit lead data via the actor and invalidates the leads query on success.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides hooks to get and save the caller’s user profile using React Query mutations and queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useUniqueNumber.ts: Retrieves the caller’s unique number, returning null if unavailable, with loading state tied to actor readiness.
frontend/src/hooks/useWallet.ts: Contains hooks to fetch wallet balance and weekly return, and mutations for purchasing plans and initializing the wallet.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, theme variables, dark mode values, accessibility utilities, and custom UI effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Sets up React rendering with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the App component.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Renders the user dashboard showing profile data, wallet stats, and navigation actions using various hooks.
frontend/src/pages/InvestmentPlansPage.t: Displays the investment plans section with header, pricing, and footer, supporting navigation and sign-in triggers.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Builds the main landing page with hero, features, AI insights, CTAs, and navigation to plans or sign‑in.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Renders a protected profile page showing the user's name, email, principal ID, and unique number with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/WalletPage.tsx: Displays the user's wallet balance with loading/error handling and includes disabled deposit and withdrawal UI sections.
frontend/src/router/AppRouter.tsx: Defines hash‑based routing and navigation handlers, wiring pages with protection, sign‑in flow, and inactivity timeout.
frontend/src/router/ProtectedDashboardRo: Guards dashboard routes by checking authentication, showing loading or sign‑in prompts when needed.
frontend/src/router/useHashRoute.ts: Implements simple hash‑based routing with route parsing and navigation helpers.
frontend/src/utils/availableBalance.ts: Provides a helper to format numeric balances as USD strings.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters for hash or query‑based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the project.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features for a My Profile page, and new feature requests. Contains state such as schema version, project name, and pending requirements.
